nodes.title: Updated french locale and added new translator utils
Use language-detection library for increased accuracy and support more languages
Updated linux scripts so they can be started from any working directory
In case of reload404, load only failed documents
Increase timeout of IndexBrowser_p operations to 5 minutes
NGI0 - Updating licensing aspects according REUSE
banner: differentiate between speed of indexing and crawling
Replace all mentions of luccioman in docker Readme
Fix formatting errors in the README file
Start script run on FreeBSD and likely other BSDs
Fix a typo in french stopwords : "celà" => "cela"
Display correct time in Rejected URLs overview
misc cleanup, and unverified but possibly successful attempts at performance improvement
Add a readme file of Chinese version for more chinese join
Add a Gitter chat badge to README.md
Fix some typos in the README.
Added automatic recrawling of older documents
fixed loading default settings in Performance Settings of Queues and Processes
Wrong password was removed after the SSL certificate import
adjusted .travis.yml to build in libbuild first and test build instructions
Use java.net.URLDecoder to fix UTF-8 related issues
Added entrypoint script for docker to catch SIGTERM
Allow disabling Javabin encoding for remote Solr queries.
(WIP) Tradeoff between sorting accuracy and display latency
Fixes #16 Updates documentation about cloning and build from source
Crawl monitoring : refresh running crawls table
YaCy Mac OS bundle : store data in the right place
Fixed packaging for YaCy 1.90 on MacOS
Fixed HTTPS  mixed content warnings and errors
Opensearch : fix for default ports and naming consistency
Updated french translation for some pages
Make YaCy usable on small screen devices
LibreJS compliance : YaCy JavaScript license information
Improve Docker image security, size and reliability
Update debian dependency to allow installing with java 1.8
Use aria role to reduce rssTerminal verbosity.
Docker image building from latest sources
Prevent start scripts to fail silently when yacycore.jar was not built.
improve plotting to make better use of y range
Favicon retrieval and image preview enhancements
Refactoring : use StandardCharsets instead of hardcoded charset names
Log files are commitable and shouldn't be
Allow full size preview of TIFF images and fixed some rendering issues
Translator refactoring : no more regular expression processing
